member.name: T:System.Windows.VersionHelpers
member.summary: Provides static methods that can be used to determine the current OS version or identify whether it is a Windows or Windows Server release.

member.name: M:System.Windows.VersionHelpers.IsWindowsVersionOrGreater(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Indicates if the current OS version matches, or is greater than, the provided version information. This method is useful in confirming a version of Windows Server that doesn't share a version number with a client release.
member.remarks: You should only use this method if the other provided version helper methods do not fit your scenario.
member.exception: is smaller than 5 or and/or are smaller than 0.
member.param: The major Service Pack version number.
member.returns: True if the specified version matches, or is greater than, the version of the current Windows OS; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.Windows.VersionHelpers.IsWindowsXPOrGreater
member.summary: Indicates if the current OS version matches, or is greater than, the Windows XP version.
member.returns: True if the current OS version matches, or is greater than, the Windows XP version; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.Windows.VersionHelpers.IsWindowsXPSP1OrGreater
member.summary: Indicates if the current OS version matches, or is greater than, the Windows XP with Service Pack 1 (SP1) version.
member.returns: True if the current OS version matches, or is greater than, the Windows XP with SP1 version; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.Windows.VersionHelpers.IsWindowsXPSP2OrGreater
member.summary: Indicates if the current OS version matches, or is greater than, the Windows XP with Service Pack 2 (SP2) version.
member.returns: True if the current OS version matches, or is greater than, the Windows XP with SP2 version; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.Windows.VersionHelpers.IsWindowsXPSP3OrGreater
member.summary: Indicates if the current OS version matches, or is greater than, the Windows XP with Service Pack 3 (SP3) version.
member.returns: True if the current OS version matches, or is greater than, the Windows XP with SP3 version; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.Windows.VersionHelpers.IsWindowsVistaOrGreater
member.summary: Indicates if the current OS version matches, or is greater than, the Windows Vista version.
member.returns: True if the current OS version matches, or is greater than, the Windows Vista version; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.Windows.VersionHelpers.IsWindowsVistaSP1OrGreater
member.summary: Indicates if the current OS version matches, or is greater than, the Windows Vista with Service Pack 1 (SP1) version.
member.returns: True if the current OS version matches, or is greater than, the Windows Vista with SP1 version; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.Windows.VersionHelpers.IsWindowsVistaSP2OrGreater
member.summary: Indicates if the current OS version matches, or is greater than, the Windows Vista with Service Pack 2 (SP2) version.
member.returns: True if the current OS version matches, or is greater than, the Windows Vista with SP2 version; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.Windows.VersionHelpers.IsWindows7OrGreater
member.summary: Indicates if the current OS version matches, or is greater than, the Windows 7 version.
member.returns: True if the current OS version matches, or is greater than, the Windows 7 version; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.Windows.VersionHelpers.IsWindows7SP1OrGreater
member.summary: Indicates if the current OS version matches, or is greater than, the Windows 7 with Service Pack 1 (SP1) version.
member.returns: True if the current OS version matches, or is greater than, the Windows 7 with SP1 version; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.Windows.VersionHelpers.IsWindows8OrGreater
member.summary: Indicates if the current OS version matches, or is greater than, the Windows 8 version.
member.returns: True if the current OS version matches, or is greater than, the Windows 8 version; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.Windows.VersionHelpers.IsWindows8Point1OrGreater
member.summary: Indicates if the current OS version matches, or is greater than, the Windows 8.1 version.
member.returns: True if the current OS version matches, or is greater than, the Windows 8.1 version; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.Windows.VersionHelpers.IsWindows10OrGreater
member.summary: Indicates if the current OS version matches, or is greater than, the Windows 10 version.
member.returns: True if the current OS version matches, or is greater than, the Windows 10 version; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.Windows.VersionHelpers.IsWindowsServer
member.summary: Indicates if the current OS is a Windows Server release. Applications that need to distinguish between server and client versions of Windows should call this method.
member.returns: True if the current OS is a Windows Server version; otherwise, false.
